author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In Texas land, a frightful tale,
Five souls to death imbued,
A squabble harsh, a senseless fail,
By monstrous hearts construed.

In northern wilds, the oil sands cry,
As darkened waters seep,
The tribes do scorn, the land doth sigh,
The secrets that it keeps.

Ukraine's fair plants, the danger near,
Explosions mark the fight,
Diplomacy now must lend an ear,
Preserve the sacred light.

feedItems.title: Five People Killed in Texas Shooting; Authorities Searching for Suspect
feedItems.description: A noise dispute may have set off the attack that left an 8-year-old and four adults dead, according to law enforcement.

feedItems.title: Exxon's Canadian Affiliate Struggles With Oil Sands Wastewater Leak
feedItems.description: Indigenous groups are criticizing a delay in revealing the full extent of toxic seepage in northern Alberta.

feedItems.title: Explosions Near Ukraine's Giant Nuclear Plant Prompt Diplomatic Push
feedItems.description: The United Nations atomic energy agency is racing to prevent the war in Ukraine from endangering the Zaporizhzhia facility as fighting nearby intensifies.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In India's realm, a battle fierce,
For love doth strive 'gainst custom's vice,
Yet marriage rights shall pierce the hearse,
Of bigotry, religion's price.

In Brooklyn's streets, a car doth dwell,
A Corvette old, with storied tale,
Midst rattling carts and potholed hell,
In sunshine gleams, its joy unveiled.

Now to fair Chicago's scene,
A pot of pizza, famed devise,
A legal strife assaults serene,
In line they stand, for savory prize.

feedItems.title: In India's Landmark Same-Sex Marriage Case, Arguments Span Equality, Family, Religion
feedItems.description: Petitioners seeking marriage rights for LGBTQ people face opposition from India’s socially conservative government.

feedItems.title: His 1960 Corvette Is At Home in a Public Brooklyn Garage
feedItems.description: Jan Hyde drives his first-generation Corvette on New York City’s potholed streets “when the weather is nice.”

feedItems.title: Chicago Eatery That Invented Pizza Pot Pie in Legal Battle
feedItems.description: Despite an ownership fight, it is business as usual at the longtime eatery where patrons line the sidewalk to get a seat.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In DeSantis' trove lie treasures bold,
A fortune vast, but yet so cold,
With cunning guile and artful pleas,
He seeks to claim, as ruler sees.

Amongst the Orient's mighty realm,
Their vessels sail, as oars o'erwhelm,
To forge alliances and trade,
In quest for liquid fire, unswayed.

The lodgings dearth, a dragon's hoard,
Now doubled, as the market roared,
In scarce a moon, a change so stark,
Renters wronged, caught in the dark.

feedItems.title: How Ron DeSantis Could Unlock $86 Million for a Presidential Run
feedItems.description: Some election lawyers say the cash, sitting in a Florida political committee, can’t be used to help his White House bid, but his allies are pressing forward.

feedItems.title: China's Oil Strategy Mixes Diplomacy and a Domestic Drilling Push
feedItems.description: Chinese oil companies are increasing their drilling at home and signing big deals overseas as part of a push for energy security.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: Just 18 months ago, a 10% hike was normal. Today, rents there are up 100%.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In days of yore, a modest rate,
Did dwell upon the dwelling's gate,
But now doth heed the soaring call,
A hundred-fold increase befall.

Of Lagerfeld's companion, fair,
Choupette, we wonder, dost she dare,
To grace the Met, the red rug fierce,
And in their hearts, the masses pierce?

In subtle threads, Succession's dames,
Do spin and weave their artful games,
Gerri's hat, and Willa's guise,
Fair Isle whispers 'neath Shiv's eyes.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: Just 18 months ago, a 10% hike was normal. Today, rents there are up 100%.

feedItems.title: The Met Gala's Most Anticipated Guest? Karl Lagerfeld's Cat, Choupette
feedItems.description: Fans are wondering whether the feline heir of a storied fashion designer could make red-carpet history

feedItems.title: The Fashion Power Plays of the 'Succession' Women
feedItems.description: Gerri’s hat. Willa’s minis. Shiv’s dormant warm and fuzzy side, as told by her long-lost Fair Isle sweaters. What the style in HBO’s hit tells us about women angling for power.
